title: AI Voice Assistant Application Development: Experiential Learning-Based Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming concepts and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Interest in utilizing AI tools to enhance work efficiency as a professional

learning_goals: Learners can implement basic functionalities of a voice assistant application using block-based programming tools.
Learners can explain the operating principles of artificial intelligence from a mathematical modeling perspective.
Learners can design problem-solving strategies applying computational thinking (CT) through experiential learning activities.

resources: Block-Based AI Development Platform (e.g., MIT App Inventor)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
